color: yellow, red, purple, black, pink, green, blue
material: neoprene-coated cast iron core, plastic rack
usage: bicep curls, tricep extensions, lunges and squats, cardio, shoulder press, muscle activation and coordination exercises
key_features: precision hex shape for ground stability
ai_description: A complete dumbbell set featuring three pairs of brightly colored neoprene-coated dumbbells (yellow 1kg, red 1.5kg, purple 2kg) displayed on a black A-frame plastic rack. The hex-shaped dumbbells have flat bottoms and ergonomic handles, all bearing the KAKSS logo. Lifestyle images show the dumbbells in use across various settings. Packaging highlights include prominent 'NON TOXIC', 'GUARANTEE', 'COMPLETELY SMELL PROOF!' and 'Easy Washable' seals on white backgrounds.
target_audience: home gym users, commercial gyms, fitness enthusiasts
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
